ValidationRule.description: Address field is mandatory for Logistic accounts
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Logistic_Account', OR( ISBLANK(BillingCountry) , ISBLANK(BillingStreet), ISBLANK(BillingCity), ISBLANK(BillingPostalCode) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill all required address fields.
